words.def: the sport of traveling on a bicycle or motorcycle
Any of a group of proteins whose presence in a cell varies through its cycle, and that regulates this cycle by forming a complex with kinase.
A phenolic derivative of glycine, N-4-hydroxyphenylglycine, used as a photographic developer.
someone who is critical of the motives of others
the deliberate act of deviating from the truth
fruit (especially peach) whose flesh adheres strongly to the pit
water chestnut whose spiny fruit has two rather than 4 prongs
the dark negative feminine principle in Chinese dualistic cosmology
strong liquor flavored with juniper berries
United States sculptor and architect whose public works include the memorial to veterans of the Vietnam War in Washington (born in 1959)
a soft silver-white univalent element of the alkali metal group
a unit of length equal to one twelfth of a foot
